Author: Knox
Content: But_ let's say I have a stat that tells me me how much damage I can withstand defense wise. Let's say this stat is at 85 or 90%. When I take a hit_ I take a little HP damage but retain my stance when I do. Aka Poise. So_ I can keep blocking while taking HP damage_ but eventually I'll break at some point_ because poise doesn't last forever. I would imagine it's like that for the shield hero
